channel.title: [PI] Timer giving points?
channel.description:
Hello people,
I have an idea of making a point system that gives you a point every hour that you're online. I've finished [b]almost[/b] everything, except the part that gives you a point every hour. Tried copying and customizing some codes like: "Vote command with [b]repeating message[/b]" Then, i replaced the thing that said: [code]c.sendMessage("Please vote");[/code] With [code]dailypoint += 5;[/code]
Still it won't add 5 points. Please respond.
